com.dooapp.gaedo.informer
Class InformerMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.dooapp.gaedo.informer.InformerMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
@Named(value="informer")
public class InformerMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
implements Serializable

Goal generating informer classes in a target folder from bean classes.

Author:
ndx
See Also:

Field Detail

project

public org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project
Maven project object, used to get sources paths

includes

public String[] includes
Sources that will be scanned

excludes

public String[] excludes
Defines which of the included files in the source directories to exclude (none by default).

requiredInterfaces

public String[] requiredInterfaces
Only classes implementing those interfaces will have their informers generated. Interface name should be fully qualified. Notice that this array is by default empty, which make it require no interface at all.

requiredAnnotations

public String[] requiredAnnotations
Only classes having those annotations defined wil have their informers generated Annotation name should be fully qualified.

propertiesExcludes

public String[] propertiesExcludes
A list of properties names that should be excluded. Format of properties written here can be in two forms:
  • Simple strings
  • Javadoc-comaptible properties : package.class#property

buildInformerFor

public void buildInformerFor(japa.parser.ast.CompilationUnit source,
                             Collection<String> qualifiedEnums,
                             Map<String,Class> resolvedInformers,
                             Collection<String> excludedProperties)
                      throws IOException
Build informer for the given compilation unit

Parameters:
source - source compilation unit, from which informations will be read
qualifiedEnums - known qualified enums in project
resolvedInformers - already resolved informers
excludedProperties - collection of excluded properties definitions
Throws:
IOException

createInformerFileFrom

public void createInformerFileFrom(InformerInfos informerInfos,
                                   File baseOutput,
                                   Collection<String> qualifiedEnums,
                                   Map<String,Class> resolvedInformers)
                            throws IOException
Generate the informer file from the obtained informations

Parameters:
informerInfos - informations extracted from a compilation unit
baseOutput - base output dir, from which package and class name will be both extracted
qualifiedEnums - already known qualified enums
resolvedInformers - resolved informers
Throws:
IOException
